00099 // I am not going to make s and t macros, as their context
00100 // can be either state->tex_list[0] or state->tex or even
00101 // a shader parameter, which is more common.
00102 // Also, s is often used as shortcut for miState loops, too.
00103 //
00104 //  #ifndef undef_s
00105 //  #define s  (state->tex_list[0].x)
00106 //  #endif
00107 
00108 //  #ifndef undef_t
00109 //  #define t  (state->tex_list[0].y)
00110 //  #endif
00111 
00113 #ifndef undef_ncomps
00114 #define ncomps  (4)
00115 #endif
00116 
00118 #ifndef undef_time
00119 #define time (state->time)
00120 #endif

00129 #define dPdtime  (state->motion)
00130 #endif
00131 
00132 // L is not defined as a macro.  Definition changes based on surface or
00133 // light shader.  Ps is not defined, as it is == P, as it should be.
00134 
00137 #define mr_get_array( iType, iParams, iName ) \
00138     miInteger i_ ## iName = *mi_eval_integer( iParams->i_ ## iName ); \
00139     miInteger n_ ## iName = *mi_eval_integer( iParams->n_ ## iName ); \
00140     const iType*    iName = mr_eval( iParams-> ## iName ) + i_ ## iName;
